description:
The eye of the storm. Find it if you want to survive. ...Or, surfing, looks like. (Could benefit from the player's actor being highlighted much better. And from actual health. And being winnable. And having a story. But otherwise, looking good.)

Time assaults you with billowing waves of thought.

Vision lost, hearing lost, touch lostâ€¦ Perhaps you can find something else? Even with nothing, you are not done for. Reach out with your mind and grasp thoughts.
